content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello, Mr. Wang. I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. Let's focus on the rental price. What is your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Considering my financial situation as a student and desiring to keep the expenses low while maintaining responsibility, I'm eager to propose a competitive price for this superb apartment. However, as our current discussion only concerns the rental price, I'll hold off on the specific number for now. I look forward to a mutually satisfactory negotiation.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I understand your position, Mr. Wang. Let's start with an offer of 800 euros per month. Remember, we are only discussing the rental price at the moment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: While your proposed price might be reasonable for other individuals, as a diligent student, I'm striving to find a more cost-effective solution, considering the apartment's location and unfurnished state. I'll need to give this some thought and possibly re-engage in our negotiation in the future. I don't want to continue the negotiation at this moment, mainly due to the need for further contemplation.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I understand, Mr. Wang. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because you need more time to consider the price. Please feel free to reach out when you're ready to continue our negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
